item.title: Tasky on Foresight 2
item.description: Tasky is a new task management application for the GNOME desktop. Written by Boyd Timothy and Calvin Gaisford, Tasky features syncing with Remember the Milk, but doesn’t feature the ability to use RTM tags yet. Tasky is a great way to help implement and use Getting Things Done. I went on the adventure last night of packaging Tasky for Foresight 2 in my personal repository on rBuilder, the first package I’ve added to my own repo.
